Title: The Land Before Time V: The Mysterious Island
Writer: John Loy (screenplay), Judy Freudberg (characters), Tony Geiss (characters)
Actors: John Ingle, Brandon La Croix, Aria Noelle Curzon, Rob Paulsen
Plot: Littlefoot and his friends the gang in their next when a swarm of leaf gobblers had destroyed their homes and this forces them to find a new home but yet find an mysterious island.
